rules_text:
Artifacts you control have “{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.
special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
II – You gain 1 life for each artifact you control.
III – For each artifact you control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
